Upon seeing first enemy: Hello, I am SmackGPT, a combat analysis AI program.
I will be analyzing your fights and providing you with helpful tips.
Here is your first tip: If you run out of Stamina you won’t be able to dodge or attack, so manage it carefully!
Did you know you can perform combos by mixing light and heavy attacks?
Hitting enemies reduces their Poise. If their Poise is reduced to 0 they will be stunned for a few seconds.
After killing 11 enemies after getting shield
If you parry a melee attack it will greatly reduce the enemy’s Poise, potentially stunning them
